docs.title: 時間複雜度
docs.text:
\(O(m \times α(n) + p \times (n + k \times α(n)))\)

#include <bits/stdc++.h>

struct Dsu {
    std::vector<int> p;
    Dsu(int n) : p(n, -1) {}

    int rf(int x) {
        if (p[x] < 0) return x;
        return p[x] = rf(p[x]);
    }

    void cb(int x, int y) {
        x = rf(x);
        y = rf(y);

        if (x == y) return;
        if (p[x] > p[y]) std::swap(x, y);

        p[x] += p[y];
        p[y] = x;
        return;
    }

    bool same(int x, int y) {
        return rf(x) == rf(y);
    }
};

int main() {
    std::cin.tie(nullptr) -> sync_with_stdio(false);

    int n, m;
    std::cin >> n >> m;

    Dsu base(2 * n);

    for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) {
        int a, b;
        std::cin >> a >> b;
        base.cb(a, b + n);
        base.cb(b, a + n);
    }

    int p, k;
    std::cin >> p >> k;

    for (int i = 1; i <= p; i++) {
        bool can = true;
        Dsu d = base;
        for (int j = 0; j < k; j++) {
            int a, b;
            std::cin >> a >> b;
            if (d.same(a, b) || d.same(a + n, b + n)) {
                can = false;
            } else {
                d.cb(a, b + n);
                d.cb(b, a + n);
            }
        }
        if (!can) std::cout << i << '\n';
    }
    return 0;
}

docs.title: 思路
docs.text: 一個鑰匙可以開多個寶箱和只能用一次

docs.title: 時間複雜度
docs.text:
\(O(n \times k)\)

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

vector<int> keyToBox[100005], boxToKey[100005];

int main() {
    int n, m, k, t, x;
    cin >> n >> m >> k >> t;

    queue<int> q;
    vector<bool> used(m);
    vector<int> boxInDegree(n);

    for (int i = 0; i < t; i++) {
        cin >> x;
        q.emplace(x);
    }

    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
        for (int j = 0; j < k; j++) {
            cin >> x;
            keyToBox[x].emplace_back(i);
            boxInDegree[i]++;
        }
    }

    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
        for (int j = 0; j < k; j++) {
            cin >> x;
            boxToKey[i].emplace_back(x);
        }
    }

    int cnt = 0;
    while (!q.empty()) {
        int u = q.front();
        q.pop();

        if (used[u]) continue;

        for (int box : keyToBox[u]) {
            boxInDegree[box]--;
            if (boxInDegree[box] == 0) {
                cnt++;
                for (int key : boxToKey[box]) {
                    if (!used[key]) {
                        q.emplace(key);
                    }
                }
            }
        }

        used[u] = true;
    }
    cout << cnt;
}

docs.title: 思路
docs.text: 分別枚舉 k 和 s，再從枚舉 k 的結果二分搜找沒在 s 裡的

docs.title: 時間複雜度
docs.text:
\(O(|K|^L + |S| \times L + K^L \times \log S)\)

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

string k, s;
int l;

set<string> res;
void dfs(int i, string a) {
    if (i == l) {
        res.insert(a);
    } else {
        for (int j = 0; j < k.size(); j++) {
            a += k[j];
            dfs(i + 1, a);
            a.pop_back();
        }
    }
}

int main() {
    cin >> k >> l >> s;
    string a = "";
    dfs(0, a);

    set<string> res2;
    string b = "";
    for (int i = 0; i < s.size(); i++) {
        b += s[i];
        if (b.size() == l) {
            res2.insert(b);
            b.erase(b.begin());
        }
    }

    // for (auto ss : res2) {
    //     cout << ss << '\n';
    // }

    for (string t : res) {
        if (res2.find(t) == res2.end()) {
            cout << t;
            return 0;
        }
    }

    return 0;
}
